content:
ICS 269, Spring 2001: Theory Seminar

The theory group meets Fridays at 1:00pm. All of the meeting except one will be held in CS 432. The May 11 meeting will be held in ICS2 144.

Here is this quarter's schedule. (Clicking on the title gives the abstract where available.)

April 6 CS 432   Organizational Meeting
April 13      
April 20 CS 432 David Eppstein Triangles and Squares
April 27      
May 4 CS 432 Sandy Irani Authoritative Sources in a Hyperlinked Environment, by Jon Kleinberg
May 11 ICS2 144 George Lueker First-Fit Interval Scheduling with Three Links and Deterministic Service
May 18      
May 25 CS 432 Gwendoline Chien Topic to be determined
June 1 CS 432 Javid Huseynov "Hamiltonicity and colorings of arrangement graphs" by Stefan Felsner, Ferran Hurtado, Marc Noy, Ileana Streinu
June 8 CS 432 David Hart "Approximating the Shortest Path in a Line Arrangement"

Previous quarters' theory seminars
